module.name: Company Boilerplate
module.description: Boilerplate language for any contract with a Company and some other entity

defaults.def: The Governing Law State shall be Delaware.
The Notice Period shall mean 48 hour(s).

section.name: Governing Law
section.text: This and all acts and transactions pursuant hereto and the rights and obligations of the parties hereto shall be governed, construed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the State of , without giving effect to principles of conflicts of law.

section.name: Entire Agreement; Enforcement of Rights
section.text: This sets forth the entire agreement and understanding of the parties relating to the subject matter herein and merges all prior discussions between them. No modification of or amendment to this , nor any waiver of any rights under this , shall be effective unless in writing signed by the parties to this . The failure by either party to enforce any rights under this shall not be construed as a waiver of any rights of such party.

section.name: Severability
section.text:
If one or more provisions of this are held to be unenforceable under applicable law, the parties agree to renegotiate such provision in good faith. In the event that the parties cannot reach a mutually agreeable and enforceable replacement for such provision, then
such provision shall be excluded from this ,
the balance of the shall be interpreted as if such provision were so excluded" /> , and
the balance of the shall be enforceable in accordance with its terms .

section.name: Construction
section.text: This is the result of negotiations between and has been reviewed by each of the parties hereto and their respective counsel, if any; accordingly, this shall be deemed to be the product of all of the parties hereto, and no ambiguity shall be construed in favor of or against any one of the parties hereto.

section.name: notices
Notices
section.text: Any notice required or permitted by this shall be in writing and shall be deemed sufficient upon delivery, when delivered personally or by overnight courier or sent by email or fax (upon customary confirmation of receipt), or after being deposited in the U.S. mail as certified or registered mail with postage prepaid, addressed to the party to be notified at such party’s address or fax number as set forth on the signature page or as subsequently modified by written notice.

section.name: successors
Successors and Assigns
section.text: The rights and benefits of this shall inure to the benefit of, and be enforceable by the successors and assigns.
